body_html:
Just note, I had similar problem, by setting following variables during configuration phase:

export CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH="/usr/lib64"
	export TF_NEED_CUDA="1"
	export TF_CUDA_VERSION="9.0"
	export TF_CUDNN_VERSION="7"

And all is good.

body:
Just note, I had similar problem, by setting following variables during configuration phase:
```
export CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH="/usr/lib64"
	export TF_NEED_CUDA="1"
	export TF_CUDA_VERSION="9.0"
	export TF_CUDNN_VERSION="7"
```

And all is good.
